attributes.action: require Utility Companies to make the flood protection of their facilities, to a standard approved by the Environment Agency as able to withstand a July 2007 event, as a first and over-riding charge upon their profits, freezing all dividends until such time as compliance is achieved; and to charge the Utilities at full commercial rates for all emergency assistance made available by the public services.
